channel.title: eclim on Emain Ablach
channel.description: Recent content in eclim on Emain Ablach

item.title: Eclim Setup
item.description: Today I come into the situation where I am forced to use Eclipse, one of those huge IDEs that isolate me from the warm terminal world. However, as a user of (neo)vim, nothing can stop me from doing things in a, at least, vim-like environment. At this moment, one tool comes into my mind: Eclim, which I have been wondering about since the time when I was still using Windows XP back in my high school.
